instant research; Reveal the position of all enemy Kings to your team for a few seconds. The Kings appear on the mini-map as a flashing X. Each time you research Treason, 400 gold is immediately deducted from your stockpile. (Only available in Regicide game.)
key_value.41113:
Research Spies (‹cost›)
instant research; Reveal all enemy units and buildings by showing you their line of sight. The total cost is 200 gold per each enemy villager.
